Repeating traces

What is repeating traces?

When an application has been terminated, run this application again

Why do we need to repeat traces?

In typical multi-programmed workloads (not multi-threaded), whan an application is terminated earlier than other applications, typically we keep running early-terminated application until the last application is terminated.

How to enable repeating trace?

There are two ways to enable repeating traces.

  • Multi-programmed workloads - set *m_simBase->m_knobs->KNOB_REPEAT_TRACE 1
  • Single-application - set *m_simBase->m_knobs->KNOB_REPEAT_TRACE 1 and set *m_simBase->m_knobs->KNOB_REPEAT_TRACE_N positive number
